description: A React component for managing invite sending and acceptance, including UI elements and interaction logic.

methods.name: InviteSignup()
methods.description: React functional component handling invite sending and acceptance UI and logic.

methods.name: sendInvite
methods.description: Sends an invitation request to the server with the entered email.

methods.name: accept
methods.description: Accepts an invitation using the token and profile data, completing the signup process.
